snippet.title: Swift: FB Messenger - How to create Chat Bubbles (Ep 5)
snippet.description:
Today, we'll look into how to create those nifty little chat bubbles that you see inside of almost every chat application out there.  Follow along and you'll be amazed how easy it is! Enjoy :)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp

(Part 1) Building out the UI with Auto Layout in Code / Programmatically: https://youtu.be/XtEoKixIfG4
(Part 2) Core Data - Create, Read, and Delete Entities:
https://youtu.be/TW_jcvVvPwI
(Part 3) Core Data - NSSortDescriptor, NSPredicate: https://youtu.be/hz1h_ColGy0
(Part 4) Tabs Menu: https://youtu.be/VgvruodC9BU

Source code can be found here:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Facebook-Chat-Messenger
